# AVAsyncProperty.Status.failed(_:)

**Case**

A property value fails to load.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed(NSError)
```

## Parameters

- **error**: An error object that describes the failure.

## Status values

- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.notYetLoaded**: The system hasn’t loaded a property value.
- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.loading**: The system is loading the property.
- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.loaded(_:)**: A property value is ready to use.
